context.flawed_solution:
#### 4
First find how much barbecue sauce Jack makes by adding the volume of each ingredient: 3 cups + 1 cup = <<3+1=4>>4 cups
Then multiply the number of pulled pork sandwiches by the amount of sauce per sandwich to find the total amount used: 1/6 cup/sandwich * 18 sandwiches = <<1/6*18=3>>3 cups
Then subtract this amount from the total amount of sauce Jack has to find how much he uses on the burgers: 4 cups - 3 cups = <<4-3=1>>1 cups
Then divide this amount by the amount of sauce used per burger to find the number of burgers he can make: 1 cups / 1/4 cup/burger = 4 burgers
